participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Ethan is focused on achieving his goals and making an impact in the business world.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.name: Linda Hayes
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, Linda enjoys sharing stories from her life and has a passion for teaching and engaging with others.
participant_2.background: i am a retired gym teacher. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
